main.name: Er. Ricky Harerri
main.description: I draw on techniques from several disciplines, combined with a unique blend of design thinking and a creative approach to challenge conventional thinking. I‚Äôm a trusted advisor and partner with technology leadership, always identifying opportunities to promote efficiency and productivity while gaining a competitive advantage. I draw from a diverse background of experiences, harvesting ideas from different disciplines, and apply them to business and technology problems.
main.bio: I‚Äôve coordinated large-scale projects, leading strong technical teams to meet key business deliverables, always focused on execution of operational excellence. A skilled communicator, I can help others understand complex concepts in a simple and efficient manner, and have introduced strategies that resulted in high production, cost reduction, and revenue growth. People enjoy working with me because of my professional and positive attitude, my collaborative leadership style, and my ability to communicate with all levels of the organization.

work.title: Full Stack Engineer | IT Consultant | Entrepreneur
work.description: Tech Stack -> React JS, Electron JS, AWS, Python, PHP, Laravel, Lumen, SQL, RabbitMQ, Swagger, Docker, Kubernetes, Angular, HTML5, SCSS, Bootstrap, Stripe Payments, Elasticsearch, Wordpress, Confluence, Meister Task, Git. Built Web Services and amazing user-interfaces. Key player in all phases of the software development lifecycle (SDLC) for multiple products. Collaborated closely with other team members to plan, design and develop robust software solutions. Wrote maintainable, extensible and well documented code in an agile environment. Improved existing code using SOLID design principles.

Here, at the organisation I was Responsible for core level Software Development using Codignitor, Yii2 & Laravel Framework. CMS that i had used were Wordpress, Joomla, Magento, OSClass, Opencart. testimonials.text: He is one of the best developer in our group, We worked on many different custom projects and thanks to Prabhjot all are successful. He is dedicated and master in his field.

testimonials.text: I have worked with Prabhjot, he is gem of person and very sound in skills. He always goes extra mile to finish the job on time and with utmost quality. I highly recommend him if you seek any Web development work. He is master of his domain. Wish him all the good luck.

testimonials.text:
Prabhjot is a person with high professional ethics and also possess a great sense of coding. He is exceptionally good with his logics in Php, Javascript, AWS, React and

 Prabhjot will be a great asset to any organization with his outstanding work and talent.

testimonials.text: one of the best programmer i had met.

testimonials.text: Prabhjot is a transcendent full-stack developer. He has excellent technical, presentation and communication abilities. I have a great experience with him while doing a Long-term ReactJS and PHP project. He always ready to learn new technologies and show up his keen interest to jump into challenging situations. He always provides a higher preference for his work, I like his passion regarding work. He knows very well about how to work on long-term projects and how to deal with clients. I see his dedication for his projects closely & His response time to any query is excellent i.e 24X7.
testimonials.user: Sukhbir Singh | Software Engineer | via Linkedin Recommendations

testimonials.text: I had the pleasure of working with Prabhjot at my former agency. Prabhjot is very knowledgeable, problem-solver dedicated team player. He would forever be the first personality to raise their hand to volunteer to help out any obstacle. He would always come in and ask other team members if they need any help. Prabhjot consistently paid close attention to details when he was in client meetings & conferences. His Quotations, Timeframes towards Projects are always accepted. Prabhjot was always on time and one of the hardest workers in the room.
testimonials.user: Satnam Singh | Software Engineer | via Linkedin Recommendations

testimonials.text: Highly skilled and professional. Complete his tasks very fast and with 100% accuracy.
